sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Product = ({post}) => { const {cart} = useSelector((state) => state); const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{post.title}

{post.description}

{post.price}

{ cart.some((p) => p.id == post.id) ? () : () }
) } export default Product
